snippet: One court has "exclusive competence" if the various central banks get into a legal argument over cash flows between them and the European Central Bank. It's a German one, of course.
abstract: One court has "exclusive competence" if the various central banks get into a legal argument over cash flows between them and the European Central Bank. It's a German one, of course.

headline.main: German Law, Not European, if a Central Bank Defaults
